short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read the story of two humans who quit their jobs to work remotely and live on the road with their dog.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
On April 1st, 2018 we left Denver to explore the Americas while working remotely. 

Our 2006 Saturn Vue (nicknamed Turtle) carried us across the Western US, and down the Pan-American highway to Panama and beyond.

Our dog Barley is along for the whole ride. His job is to make our photos look better and keep our car properly muddy.

For our friends, family, and followers who would like to help support the journey, this extension give us a little bit of extra cash every time you click a link to shop on Amazon.

You won't spend any extra money. 

Amazon has a program where they pay people to refer to products on their site.

We are simply acting as the beneficiary of that bonus when you install this extension.

Thank you for helping us out and don't forget to follow along at ElPerroTambien.com !
